description: This file defines an Angular component ('MfaComponent') for handling multi-factor authentication in the frontend application. It includes UI elements for user input and logic for processing MFA verification via injected authentication services.

classes.name: MfaComponent
classes.description: Angular component facilitating multi-factor authentication (MFA) input and validation.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook to initialize username from route parameters.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission for MFA code verification, interacts with AuthService, and navigates upon success or failure.

methods.name: goBack
methods.description: Navigates back to the login page, preserving the username query parameter.
